extendedInfo.description: Cup Cake Bakery Memory Match with Cup Cakes!An amazing memory game with various decorated Cup Cakes! Are you a Cup Cake lover? This Free game carries different Cup Cakes decorated with various topping, icing and layers. Kids are a big fan of sweets and cakes, so this game will grab their interest.Cup Cake Bakery Memory Match not just offers fun for the kids but also improve their memory and management skills. It is a card matching game that will let them boost up their ability to remember things.***FEATURES***â Easy Game play.â Three Difficulty levels to challenge your memory skills i.e Easy, Medium and Hard.â 5 addictive and amazing game stages.â Tic-Toc timer to challenge the speed at which your kids are playing.â Best flipping animations.â Scores at the end telling you how fast did you complete the level. The faster you complete the rack the more scores you earn.â Animated Splash Screen.â Colorful HD images.â Original tic-toc timer sound.***HOW TO PLAY***â Select the difficulty level from Easy, Medium and Hard.â Tap the play button to get started.â Start tapping the cards until you match them up in pairs.â Complete the matching quickly as the timer keeps on ticking.â Scores are displayed once the level is cleared.â Tap the next button & move to the next level.Hit titles include Baby Bears Long Winter Nap, The Dragon for Preschool, My Coloring Dragon, My Fairy Princess Coloring, Donuts Factory, Annoyed Birds Coloring, ABC Go Go Flash Cards &Cupcake Factory.***DISCLAIMER***â This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen.

reviews.title: Ok for kids.
reviews.comment: Theres no way to turn off sound, annoying, and just not worth my time.
reviews.author: A Google User
